title: GearMax provides
text: The solution to provide users with satisfying used cars by well-defined filters and the option for users to post any information about their private cars for sale.

section.title: Why GearMax?
section.content: GearMax improve user experience, increase the usability of the used car platform and help realize societal benefit

section.title: Why develop GearMax?
section.content: Our team will benefit from learning to build software from scratch and exploring some advanced technology such as elasticsearch and machine learning.
